prompts.frontCover: Flat 2D illustration for a greeting card, dreamy fantasy art style. In the center of a tranquil, magical sea under a soft twilight sky with gentle pastel clouds and sparkling stars, a beautiful, traditional Chinese wooden boat floats gently. On the boat, illustrated versions of Grandpa and a young Tong Tong from the reference photo are sitting together, looking at each other with warm, happy expressions. Grandpa, wearing his grey sweater, is holding a fishing rod with a glowing star lure, while Tong Tong, in a red sweater, points excitedly at the water. The boat is adorned with glowing paper lanterns and banners decorated with subtle, elegant Chinese opera mask motifs. Instead of water, the sea is a shimmering, ethereal canvas filled with whimsical, friendly sea creatures like smiling crabs, artistic prawns, and graceful fish swimming alongside the boat. The overall color palette is soft and magical, with hues of lavender, blush pink, and deep indigo, creating a serene and heartfelt atmosphere. In the center of the scene, the text "Happy Birthday, Grandpa" is written in a beautiful, flowing handwritten cursive script. The style is gentle, emotional, and magical, reminiscent of a cherished memory brought to life.
